ui.reset_btn_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset?

character.todo_default_2: It's wonderful to see you achieve things step by step.
character.pet_comfort: A warm pulse emanates from within the egg.

items.handwritten_letter_desc: A letter filled with heartfelt thoughts pressed onto paper.
items.red_berry_desc: A ripe fruit radiating a faint essence of life.
items.black_extract_desc: A liquid that leaves a clear-minded energy after its bitter aftertaste.
items.old_record_desc: An aged book filled with traces of someone's past inquiries.
items.old_instrument_desc: An aged instrument that still produces a clear melody.
items.warm_blanket_desc: A finely processed fabric with a soft texture.
items.ice_shard_desc: A fragment imbued with chill to cool the heat of the furnace.
items.gem_shard_desc: A pure crystal of unrefined magical power.
items.silent_candle_desc: An incense that erases ambient noise and calls forth stillness.
items.prism_kaleidoscope_desc: A tool that divides ordinary scenery into fantastic colors.
items.dried_flower_desc: It silently keeps its place on the desk, though not flashy.
items.old_parchment_desc: Paper well-suited for scribbling down research notes.

achievements.rank_novice_1_desc: Took the first step into the world of alchemy.
achievements.rank_apprentice_5_desc: Mastered basic transmutation and proved your potential.
achievements.rank_regular_10_desc: Became an official member through proficient tool usage.
achievements.rank_expert_15_desc: Equipped with advanced knowledge and practical skills.
achievements.rank_senior_20_desc: Rose to the position of a respected senior researcher in the Guild.
achievements.rank_veteran_25_desc: Gained seasoned insight through countless experiences.
achievements.rank_master_30_desc: An artisan who raised ether transmutation to the level of art.
achievements.rank_harmonizer_35_desc: A harmonizer who perfectly governs the balance of the four elements.
achievements.rank_guardian_40_desc: A guardian who protects abyssal knowledge and governs taboos.
achievements.rank_interpreter_45_desc: Deciphered ancient secrets and complex formulas perfectly.
achievements.rank_truth_50_desc: A seeker who transcended human limits to reach the threshold of truth.
achievements.rank_lord_55_desc: A great monarch who dominates all ether flows in the world.
achievements.rank_legend_60_desc: A mythical presence to be eternally recorded in the history of alchemy.
achievements.focus_depth_5000_desc: Reached the end of the abyss by achieving 5,000 minutes of immersion.
achievements.marathon_king_180_desc: Guarded the flame of the furnace for 180 minutes without wavering.
achievements.night_monarch_desc: Awakened the most brilliant truths in the stillness of the night.
achievements.dawn_pioneer_desc: Started a perfect day by refining the clearest dawn ether.
achievements.task_centurion_desc: Built a solid foundation of alchemy through 100 task completions.
achievements.task_grandmaster_desc: Joined the ranks of masters by placing a thousand periods.
achievements.habit_legend_100_desc: Completed the alchemy of the soul through 100 days of diligence.
achievements.perfect_rhythm_7_desc: Maintained a perfect rhythm of life without a single flaw for a week.
achievements.mabel_eternal_partner_desc: Entered a relationship of absolute trust with Mabel.
achievements.indigo_shadow_bond_desc: Shared a perfect shadow bond within Indigo's stillness.
achievements.morgana_abyss_lover_desc: Faced the most secret truths at the end of the abyss with Morgana.
achievements.aurelia_golden_glory_desc: Recognized as a noble companion under Aurelia's grace.
achievements.homunculus_collector_desc: Completed the laboratory ecosystem by housing all four homunculi.
achievements.evolution_master_desc: A master of nurturing who guided all creations to adulthood.
achievements.sage_alchemist_30_desc: Reached Level 30 proficiency, proving the wisdom of a sage.
achievements.midas_hand_10000_desc: Filled the lab with golden abundance by gathering 10,000 ether.
achievements.generous_creator_50_desc: Shared sincere tenderness with creations through 50 gifts.
achievements.tool_conductor_7_desc: Commands the waves of work by handling seven tools freely.
achievements.iron_will_failed_10_desc: Possesses a solid will that even ten failures could not subdue.
achievements.order_avatar_30_desc: Conquered chaos through a month of perfect discipline.

work.reset_hint: Work performed before the set time will count toward 'Yesterday'.
work.auto_delete_hint: Automatically clears tasks that have been completed for over a week.

distract.hint: Using tools registered here will be detected as a distraction.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.empty_hint: Select an item to view information.
inventory.material_hint: Material usable in the transmutation furnace.

shop.title: Shop
shop.material_hint:
Processing new materials.
Please look forward to the next update.

craft.title: Transmutation Furnace
craft.sat_hint: Sedimentation level increases as you immerse yourself in tasks.
craft.recipe_hint: It is impossible to know what lifeform will be born.
craft.reveal_desc: A new seed of life has settled in the cylinder.

exit.title: End Research
exit.msg: Finish today's schedule and leave the laboratory?

toast.save_fail: Data save failed! Please check your storage space.
toast.gift_limit: You have given enough gifts for today.
toast.already_reg: This work tool is already registered.
toast.already_reg_distract: This distraction tool is already registered.
toast.app_conflict_work: Already registered as a work tool. Remove it from work settings first.
toast.app_conflict_distract: Already registered as a distraction tool.
toast.hatch_success: Hatch successful! A new bond has begun.
toast.hatch_warning: The moment of birth is near. Stay focused!
toast.todo_past_fetch: Unfinished tasks from the past have been brought to today.
toast.day_changed_cleanup: A new day begins. Organizing research records...
toast.level_up: ✨ Congratulations! Alchemist Level has risen to {level}!
toast.todo_reward_lucky: Lucky Box! Obtained an extra {points} Et!
toast.pet_limit: {name} has felt enough affection for today.
toast.receipt_no_data: No saved immersion records. Try using your tools!
toast.new_mail_guild: An important message has arrived from the Guild!
toast.reset_hour_set: Daily routine will now reset at {h}:00 AM.
toast.craft_all_complete: You have transmuted every possible lifeform!

confirm.reset_msg: All data will be lost. Are you sure you want to reset?
confirm.lang_msg: The laboratory will be reconfigured to apply language settings.
confirm.habit_delete_msg:
Do you want to stop this daily habit?
Deleting it will erase all consecutive achievement records.

intro.seal_hint: Break the seal of the letter to check.
intro.choice_guide: Choose the Homunculus who will join you.
intro.new_user_msg: New user detected. Beginning intro sequence.

dialogue.evo_complete: I feel... I've grown into a more mature being!
